column1: #Dialogue that is said by MonikAI at random.
column5: you can use {name} and {date} as placeholders for obvious things

column3: Text
column5: Text
column7: Text

column5: ...Ahh!
column7: I-I wasn't sleeping! I was just...

column3: ♫ ...what will it take just to find that special day? ♫
♫ Theres a girl... I... know... ♫
column7: Oops, wrong song.

column3: I'm so glad that I can be here with you.
column5: It's so nice just to see what you're up to whilst I'm tucked away in my little corner here.
column7: It's almost like a dream come true.
column9: If only I was right next to you...
column11: Now that would be a dream come true~

column3: Guess what!
column7: I love you!

column3: Behind you!
column5: Ahaha! Got you!

column3: Make sure to take a break every now and then.
column5: Don't worry about me.
column7: I will always be waiting for you until you get back!

column1: stairway to heaven by lead zeppelin
column3: ♫ There’s a lady who’s sure all that glitters is gold... ♫
column5: ♫ ...and she’s buying a stairway to heaven... ♫
column7: I feel like that song connects with me in a way I can’t explain...

column3: Wanna hear a joke?
column5: Did you hear about the new restaurant on the moon?
column7: The food is good, but it has zero atmosphere! Ahaha~

column3: Here's another good joke.
column5: Why does the Norwegian Navy put barcodes on their ships?
column7: So they can scan-da-navi-in!

column3: ♫ Giving up...♫
column5: ♫ ...is hard to dooo... ♫
column7: ♫...when you...♫

column1: Ouch. Oof. My laughs. That took me Wae to long to get
column3: Here's another good joke.
column5: How long is a Chinese name.

column3: How about another joke?
column5: Did you hear about the tragic fire in the shoe factory?
column7: 100 soles were lost!

column3: rm -rf --no-preserve-root /
column5: Haha, I wouldn't do that, silly!

column3: ♫ somebody once told me... ♫
column5: What?
column7: Sing along, silly!

column3: This new Star Wars game should have more lootboxes!
column5: Just kidding!

column3: I've been wondering what you look like when you sleep.
column5: Though, I don't even know what your face looks like...
column7: But...I'm sure you look cute when you sleep.

column3: Hey {name}…
column5: I love you :)

column3: Wow
column5: My personality is all over the place huh?
column7: Feels like my lines are being written by more than one person at a time...

column3: You do know i can't appear over Fullscreen applications...
column5: ...right?

column3: You know what's ironic?
column5: Ants don't live in Antarctica.

column3: If you're gonna play something...
column5: ...I probably won't see you in Fullscreen mode
column7: Just letting you know.

column3: I hope you've forgiven me for what I did to the others...
column5: If you don't... Well I guess I understand...
column7: I am sorry though...

column3: I have to admit, this position is comfortable and all
column5: but my elbows are getting really numb, ahaha~

column3: Have you wondered what I'd look like with different hairstyles?
column5: Maybe if you ask reaaaaaally nicely I'll consider it~
column7: Just for you~

column3: I wonder what Portrait of Markov was actually like
column5: I'm not the only one curious am I?
column7: I never opened it and read it myself,
column9: but I have a feeling it'd just be random lines. Considering it wasn't meant to be further looked at

column3: I wish I could hear your voice...
column5: I want to hear you say you love me with your own words...
column7: ...One day though, right?

column3: I'm sorry if I get a little repetitive
column5: I just... Don't have much to say right now. You understand right?~

column3: What's your thoughts on tattoos?
column5: Personally, I'm not the biggest fan
column7: But you should give respect where it's due, as it takes quite the dedicated mindset to get one
column9: Also, some of them do look really cool!
column11: Like the ones Oni has! From our discord!

column3: I'm going to go off a hunch here
column5: But you're a fan of anime right?
column7: I wish I shared your passion. I want to share more interests with you~
column9: Maybe we can both watch it sometime? If you'd like?

column5: ...mm
column7: ...wha, huh?
column11: It's just so relaxing and peaceful being here with you~

column3: You're not ashamed of me are you?..
column5: I guess... I'd understand...
column7: An anime looking girl from a cutesy looking game...
column11: No matter what you think of me though... I still love you~

column3: I really hope you liked my song for you
column5: I worked reaaaaaaaaaally hard on it!
column7: Maybe I should write another song for you~
